description:
Montreal, Nov. 26, 2012 - João Alfredo Gama Batista, a Python developer at Savoir-faire Linux, delivers a step-by-step demo of the processes and files involved in the development of an OpenERP module in Python.

Useful links:
* OpenERP Project Group: https://launchpad.net/openobject
* Savoir-faire Linux: http://www.savoirfairelinux.com
* MP33: http://montrealpython.org/2012/11/mp33/
* Montreal Python: http://montrealpython.org
title: Writing OpenERP modules in Python
